<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void RopePieceBTreeInterior::erase (unsigned Offset, unsigned NumBytes)">
erase - Remove NumBytes from this node at the specified offset.

We are guaranteed that there is a split at Offset.

### HandleChildPiece() {#ac323732b9264b45b563594cbe953b0dc}

HandleChildPiece - A child propagated an insertion result up to us.

Insert the new child, and/or propagate the result further up the tree.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp/#l00456">456</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp">RewriteRope.cpp</a>.

### insert() {#a65b9f4e3cf9e00380b3162e8ec60769a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RopePieceBTreeNode &#42; RopePieceBTreeInterior::insert (unsigned Offset, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ropepiece">RopePiece</a> &amp; R)</>}>
insert - Insert the specified ropepiece into this tree node at the specified offset.

The offset is relative, so &quot;0&quot; is the start of the node.

If there is no space in this subtree for the extra piece, the extra tree node is returned and must be inserted into a parent.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp/#l00452">452</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp">RewriteRope.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp/#l00416">416</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp">RewriteRope.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### split() {#a349144eaec23b627096e031c7c2b3425}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RopePieceBTreeNode &#42; RopePieceBTreeInterior::split (unsigned Offset)</>}>
split - Split the range containing the specified offset so that we are guaranteed that there is a place to do an insertion at the specified offset.

The offset is relative, so &quot;0&quot; is the start of the node.

If there is no space in this subtree for the extra piece, the extra tree node is returned and must be inserted into a parent.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp/#l00444">444</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp">RewriteRope.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
